CustomField.description: Multi-attribute weighted score using a variety of sales and presales inputs to rank the quality of an opportunity (100 is best)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 80+ = winning/no fit issues 65-79 = some concerns to overcome; in good position 51-64 = early stages of sales cycle/may be some fit concerns 50 = no activity to date/check with SC Below 50 = major concerns / major fit issues; not in good position
CustomField.label: Hero Score
